name: Cross the Threshold
summary: You can cast ethereal jaunt as an occult innate spell once per day.
description:
You can cast ethereal jaunt as an occult innate spell once per day. You don't need to Sustain the Spell; instead, it lasts for 10 minutes or until you choose to return to your material form as a free action.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
